The place with the best action is the chat. But even then it's mostly always people trying to be cute with small talk. No significant discussion.

The other choice would be to post in the Forced Listening thread and carry DB tradition there. So few post in that thread that as long as I'm the most recent poster it shouldn't matter. But I can't promise anything, if you don't want to get b&.


And I got a new time goal to survive on the edge. August 8-10 is an open server.

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539e7453636872056f4c0200#post_539e7453636872056f4c0200
Draco in Leather Pants as TvTropes puts it, and I'm with you on that subject, I can't fucking stand it. I suppose that a lot of people do love a bad boy, but personally I've always loved evil characters who are just straight up evil. No misunderstanding, no life defining tragedy, just goddamn evil and powerful.

And its not like you can't make such characters interesting or complex, but nooooo we always have to go for some winging, irritating "poor wittle me!" Plot about how they're just misunderstood or its all because someone didn't love them enough.
